resources.string: The best animes together with their creators in a single app where you can learn more about your favorite animes and those that you may like
Press the Animes button to see the best animes you can find, in which there is action, comedy, drama, among other things

The story of JoJo\'s Bizarre Adventure centers on the Joestar family and their rivalry with Dio Brando. The work spans several generations, each of them having a descendant of the Joestar as the protagonist, as well as a large number of characters. In the Joestar family there is great power that materializes in different ways, although the most popular are the "stands", avatars that personify the inner power of each character. Dio Brando, as well as his descendants, also possess the power, stolen from the Joestar family.
You do not have an account?
Review the required fields before continuing

Hirohiko Araki was born in Sendai on June 7, 1960. In his youth, Araki lived with his father, an office worker; his mother, a housewife; and her two younger identical twin sisters. Growing up, Araki assumed that he lived in a house without any snacks.
Both passwords must be the same and must have more than 6 characters and less than 16
